news.title: Sarah McLachlan Announces First Album in 9 Years, Shares Video for New Song: Watch
news.summary: Better Broken, led by its title track, includes a song with Muna’s Katie Gavin

news.title: Blood Orange Shares Video for New Song “The Field”: Watch
news.summary: Devonté Hynes’ comeback track features Caroline Polachek, Daniel Caesar, and others
